channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Could This Be the Start of Amazon’s Next Robot Revolution?
item.description: The ecommerce giant has acquired a team to give bots greater intelligence and dexterity—potentially automating much more of its warehouse operations.

item.title: Tinder update targets college students as dating apps struggle
item.description: For the college students who are satisfied with dating apps, which may not be many, Tinder announced Wednesday a series of updates to Tinder U, its in...

item.title: Impersonators Take Advantage as the Trumps Delay Crypto Reveal
item.description: The Trump family has spent the past month hyping an upcoming crypto venture. In the absence of hard details about the project, scammers are filling in...

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: X lost 40 million monthly active users after Brazil ban
item.description: Bluesky has gained 2 million new users over the last week, which can only mean one thing: something fishy is going on at X. And, indeed, X was banned ...

item.title: 8 Best Water Leak Detectors We've Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: Don’t let busted pipes or an overflowing washing machine dampen your day. These WIRED-tested smart water sensors can help you catch problems quicker.

item.title: YouTube debuts new parental controls aimed at teens
item.description: Once linked, parents will be alerted to their teen's channel activity, including the number of uploads, subscriptions and comments. © 2024 TechCrunch....

item.title: How Blind Soccer Is Played at the 2024 Paris Paralympics
item.description: B1 5-a-side soccer is one of the breakout sports of the 2024 Paralympics. The biggest rule for fans: Be quiet.

item.title: Ireland’s privacy watchdog ends legal fight with X over data use for AI after it agrees to permanent limits
item.description: The exact contents of X's (now permanent) undertaking with the DPC have not been made public, but it's assumed the agreement limits how it can use peo...

item.title: Germany’s Far Right Is in a Panic Over Telegram

item.title: X doubles down on video with a new TV app
